title: Does Spirit Visage increase self healing obtained from items?

replies.body:
Yep. It increases all healing effects on you, passive or activated.

EDIT ~ Worded that wrong, it doesn't increase healing effects gained from other champions, nor does it effect your heals on another champion.

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4XEPxBc1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-25T08:30:01.481+0000)
>
> Yep. It increases all healing effects on you, passive or activated.
> 
> EDIT ~ Worded that wrong, it doesn't increase healing effects gained from other champions, nor does it effect your heals on another champion.

thanks dude!
